entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
